title: Did a mother drown her five kids because she had no food? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Several posts and news articles are being circulated claiming that a mother of five has drowned all her children in a river in Uttar Pradesh due to food scarcity during the ongoing nationwide lockdown due to Coronavirus.

The caption of the article read: “Heartbreaking! In A Shocking Incident, Mother In UP Throws 5 Children Into River. She said that she had no food for her children & that she was a daily wage earner & her work stopped during lockdown”

The post has been shared by lawyer and former Aam Aadmi Party leader Prashant Bhushan as well.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Video of mock drill in Bihar shared with misleading claim related to COVID-19

NewsMobile fact-checked the above claim and found it to be FAKE.

Bhadohi Police and PIB Uttar Pradesh posted a video of the woman who committed the horrific crime in which she described that she took the harsh step of throwing her children in a river after an argument with her husband.

“Manju Devi has not drowned her 05 children in the Ganges river due to hunger. The incident has been carried out by another cause. It is clear from Manju Devi’s statement that children have not been drowned in the river due to hunger,” police explained in the tweet.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the incident is not related to the lockdown due to COVID-19.
